Index.title: CloudBoard
Index.subtitle: Open source Windows & iOS clipboard synchronization tool, supports end-to-end encryption

usage.download_latest_version: Go to the <link>release page</link>, download and run Cloudboard.
usage.fill_in_api_endpoint: Fill in the API Endpoint, and generate an API Key, corresponding to the api_key parameter of the shortcut.
usage.fill_in_e2e_encryption: Fill in the End-to-End Encryption, corresponding to the password parameter of the shortcut.
usage.import_encrypt_helper: Download the <link>CloudboardEncryptHelper.js</link> script, and import it into Scriptable.
usage.configure_shortcut: Configure the api_key and password parameters of the shortcut, ensuring consistency with the Windows, and checking if the encryption function has been associated with Scriptable.
usage.enjoy_it: Now the clipboard on the Windows will be automatically synchronized to cloud, and iOS uses the shortcut to synchronize.
